title: Von LMO Discography
description:
Von LMO was an acclaimed figure in the No Wave movement of the late 70s and early 80s. This torrent contains his debut Future Language (1981), Cosmic Interception (released 1994, but contains tracks recorded in 1979!) and Red Resistor (1996). Also included is his compilation Tranceformer (2003), which contains Future Language plus rarities recorded anywhere between 1978 to 1999. Von LMO now writes and records in Avant Duel, an electronic project formed in 2012 with frequent collaborator Otto Von Ruggins.

contains:
(1981) Future Language
(1994) Cosmic Interception
(1996) Red Resistor
(2003) Tranceformer (Future Language 2.001)

v0 mp3
